segments.text: Welcome to the International Business Department . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'm Ms Dawson from Lexington Software . I need to send these documents to Vietnam via L / C .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , I can do that for you right now . Have you checked the documents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have , but I have never done this before so would it be possible for you to double check them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , that's all part of the service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I don't think there should be any problems , but just to be sure ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry ; I'm sure it will be fine . If I do have any queries I'll call you , OK ?
segments.speaker: S1
